name: reduce health
description: reduce the maximum number of health points.

name: reduce mana
description: reduce the maximum number of mana points.

name: reduce stamina
description: reduce the maximum number of stamina points.

name: fortify health
description: fortify the maximum number of health points.

name: fortify mana
description: fortify the maximum number of mana points.

name: fortify stamina
description: fortify the maximum number of stamina points.

name: paralyze
description: paralyze the character for a specified time.

name: poision
description: inflicts a poison effect on the character.

name: blindness
description: inflicts a blindness effect on the character.

name: silence
description: inflicts a silence effect on the character.
